entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 4 - Episode 18 - Where the Wild Things Are
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 4 - Episode 18 - Where the Wild Things Are20140513
As soon as this episode started, my wife was like "Is this the
SEX DEMON episode?" She was right. I like that Buffy/Riley cause
the problem by having sex and Xander/Anya save the problem of the
show but their B story is caused by NOT having sex.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.content:

I finished the book today. Wow, that was great.

entry.title: Movie: Casino Royale, starring Daniel Craig (2006) (2)
entry.content:

We watched this due to me reading the book. This movie is great. It
goes so many different places. Vesper is so adorable.

entry.title: Book: The Martian, by Andy Weir (2012)
entry.content:
Book: The Martian, by Andy Weir (2012)20140512
I just started this and I think it is brilliant! The dialogue is so
amazing and the balance between being tense and light is so good.
  • Books
  • 2012

entry.title: Book: Casino Royale, by Ian Fleming (1953)
entry.content:
Book: Casino Royale, by Ian Fleming (1953)20140512
I finished this book today. I found it to be an epic start to the
Bond character. I was surprised at how much of a romance it
was. The ending was incredibly somber, more so than the movie by a
long shot.
  • Books
  • 1953

entry.title: Games of Thrones - Season 4 - Episode 6 - The Laws of Gods and Men
entry.content:
Games of Thrones - Season 4 - Episode 6 - The Laws of Gods and Men20140512
The Iron Bank guy is Sherlock's brother! Theeon is
insane... really insane. Woah! Shae is back. That's
amazing. Tyrion's trial is nuts. I wonder why Shae would do this.
  • TV Shows
  • Games of Thrones

entry.title: Movie: Delivery Man, starring Vince Vaughn (2013)
entry.content:
Movie: Delivery Man, starring Vince Vaughn (2013)20140511
This is a surprisingly sweet movie. I like the little vignettes
with his kids. The lawyer's moments were really funny, especially
in his introductory scenes where he talks about his inability to
talk to his kids.
  • Movies
  • 2013

entry.title: Movie: Austenland. starring Keri Russell (2013)
entry.content:
Movie: Austenland. starring Keri Russell (2013)20140511
This movie was brilliant. Elizabeth *REDACTED*ming is silly and almost
unbearable to watch in her awkwardness, but it's great. Lady
Hartwright was very funny too in a really weird way. I'm surprised
how much I enjoyed it.
  • Movies
  • 2013

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 4 - Episode 17 - Superstar
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 4 - Episode 17 - Superstar20140510
This episode is so absurd. I love it. All the crazy dialogue
about how incompetent Buffy is really makes it, I think. The
changed opening sequence is amazing too.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 4 - Episode 17A - Eternity
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 4 - Episode 17A - Eternity20140510
I don't find Rebecca to be particularly attractive and think it's
kind of funny that Angel would be in to her at all, from a
distance. The dialogue with Cordy is the high part of this
episode, especially her amazing confrontation with Angelus.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Movie: Captain America: The Winter Soldier, starring Chris Evans (2014) (2)
entry.content:
Movie: Captain America: The Winter Soldier, starring Chris Evans (2014) (2)20140509
My wife and I saw this tonight. It was good on the second round,
but there wasn't any amazing revelation. Since I saw it the first
time, I also listened to an interview with the writers. That was
really interesting to reflect on during the movie.
  • Movies
  • 2014

entry.title: Game: Gran Turismo 6 (PS3, 2013) (20)
entry.content:
Game: Gran Turismo 6 (PS3, 2013) (20)20140508
I did two series today in about an hour. These were really tense
races, as opposed to last night which were much more relaxed. I
barely one the last  Supercar Festival race because I crashed near
the end, but I drove over some grass, crashed into the next guy,
and got ahead by about 0.002 seconds. It was intense.

International B - 37% - 45 - 286 - 34 - 176 - 98 - $2.525mil

Total time: 28:42

  • PS3
  • 2013

entry.title: Movie: Captain America, starring Chris Evans (2011) (2)
entry.content:
Movie: Captain America, starring Chris Evans (2011) (2)20140508
My wife and I watched this again in preparation for taking her to
see the second movie. It was very fun and I enjoy how wholesome
Captain America is. I nearly cried when he jumped on the grenade in
the beginning. I almost noticed Margarey from Game of Thrones in
the movie! She was the vixen that kissed Captain A!
  • Movies
  • 2011

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 4 - Episode 16A - The Ring
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 4 - Episode 16A - The Ring20140506
I feel like the whole point of this episode is to re-introduce the
Big Bad for the season (Wolfram & Hart) and get ready for the
final arc. The details of the episode are kind cool too. The
gladiatorial thing is neat.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 11 - Confessions
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 11 - Confessions20140506
Walt is amazing. I knew that Walt and Jesse would hug
eventually. Where is Holly during the day?
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 12 - Rabid Dog
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 12 - Rabid Dog20140506
They love showing Walt in his undies. Walt is so devious in all
his plans. That's funny that Badger was talking about Babylon 5
for hours. I wish in the conversation with Skyler, Walt could
explain that he loves Jesse like a son. Yikes! Hank! That was so
close. It's great listening to Jesse talk about Walter: "He's the
Devil! Whatever you think is going to happen, the exact opposite
is going to happen." It's crazy that Walt wasn't really going to
kill Jesse.
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 13 - To'hajiilee
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 13 - To'hajiilee20140506
Todd seems like a sweet guy... a bit naive though. Saul's line,
"Don't drink and drive, but if you do, call me!" That was a
brilliant move on Jesse's end.
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad
